options.monitorial.use_global_config.too: If the global config file should be used, rather than a local (per instance) one. NOTE: If this is set to false in the global config, all instances will use their local configs.
options.monitorial.automatic_mode.toolti: If Monotorial should automatically save information about the window to use for the next game launch. Disable to enable manual configuration
options.monitorial.default_monitor.toolt: The monitor that the game window will be on. Monitors with the same name are numbered going from left to right then top to bottom
options.monitorial.force_move.tooltip: Attempt to force move and resize the window after it has opened. This is required to have custom positions apply. ELS Only will only try if NeoForge's Early Loading Screen is enabled
options.monitorial.x_pos.tooltip: The X offset applied from the left side of the monitor. -1 to not try move on this axis
options.monitorial.y_pos.tooltip: The Y offset applied from the top of the monitor. -1 to not try move on this axis
options.monitorial.x_size.tooltip: The width of the window. 0 to use default width
options.monitorial.y_size.tooltip: The height of the window. 0 to use default height
options.monitorial.not_in_use.global_con: The global config is not in use due to being disabled in the global config!
The global config is not in use due to being disabled in the local config!
options.monitorial.not_in_use.local_conf: The local config is not in use due to being disabled in the local config!
